mapper.select: select pay_yearmonth, emp.employee_id, emp_name, JOB, salary, premium, sum from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_salarylist slist on emp.employee_id = slist.employee_id inner join tbl_job job on emp.JOB_ID = job.JOB_ID where DATE_FORMAT(slist.pay_yearmonth, '%Y-%m') = #{startDate};

select pay_yearmonth, emp.employee_id, emp_name, emp.JOB_ID, salary, premium, sum from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_salarylist slist on emp.employee_id = slist.employee_id where DATE_FORMAT(slist.pay_yearmonth, '%Y-%m') = #{startDate} and emp.employee_id = #{employee_id};

select emp.emp_name, emp_mail, salary, round((salary * job.ratio_bonus)) as bonus, round((salary * 0.045)) as premium_1, round((salary * 0.035)) as premium_2, round((salary * 0.120)) as premium_3, round((salary * 0.010)) as premium_4, round((salary * job.ratio_premium)) as premium, round(((salary + salary * job.ratio_bonus) - (salary * job.ratio_premium))) as sum from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_salary sal on emp.employee_id = sal.employee_id inner join tbl_job job on emp.JOB_id = job.JOB_id where emp.employee_id = #{employee_id};

select employee_id, emp_name, JOB, dep.DEPTNM from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_department dep on emp.DEPTID = dep.DEPTID inner join tbl_job job on emp.JOB_ID = job.JOB_ID where DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%Y') = #{startDate};

select emp.employee_id, emp_name, JOB, DEPTNM, bank, account, account_holder from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_salary sal on emp.employee_id = sal.employee_id inner join tbl_department dep on emp.DEPTID = dep.DEPTID inner join tbl_job job on emp.JOB_ID = job.JOB_ID where emp.employee_id = #{employee_id};

select emp.employee_id, emp_name, JOB, DEPTNM from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_department dep on emp.DEPTID = dep.DEPTID inner join tbl_job job on emp.JOB_ID = job.JOB_ID where emp.employee_id = #{employee_id};
mapper.update: insert into tbl_salary (employee_id, salary, bank, account, account_holder) value (#{employee_id}, #{salary}, #{bank}, #{account}, #{account_holder});
update tbl_salary set bank = #{bank}, account = #{account}, account_holder = #{account_holder} where employee_id = #{employee_id};
mapper.select: select employee_id, emp_name, JOB, emp.JOB_ID, dep.DEPTNM from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_department dep on emp.DEPTID = dep.DEPTID inner join tbl_job job on emp.JOB_ID = job.JOB_ID where DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%Y') = #{startDate};

select #{salary} as salary, CAST(ROUND(#{salary} * job.ratio_bonus) AS UNSIGNED) as bonus, CAST(ROUND((#{salary} * 0.045)) AS UNSIGNED) as premium_1, CAST(ROUND((#{salary} * 0.035)) AS UNSIGNED) as premium_2, CAST(ROUND((#{salary} * 0.120)) AS UNSIGNED) as premium_3, CAST(ROUND((#{salary} * 0.010)) AS UNSIGNED) as premium_4, CAST(ROUND((#{salary} * job.ratio_premium)) AS UNSIGNED) as premium, CAST(ROUND(((#{salary} + #{salary} * job.ratio_bonus) - (#{salary} * job.ratio_premium))) AS UNSIGNED) as sum from tbl_employee emp inner join tbl_job job on emp.JOB_id = job.JOB_id where emp.employee_id = #{employee_id};
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_salarylist (pay_yearmonth, employee_id, JOB_ID, salary, bonus, premium, sum) value (now(), #{employee_id}, #{JOB_ID}, #{salary}, #{bonus}, #{premium}, #{sum})
